channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for OR

item.title: Report X-2024040114
item.description:
Report X-2024040114

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-08T15:12:24+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-26
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: UNLOADER FOUND PACKAGE THAT WAS EXTERNAL SOURCE AFFECTED. RESPONDER RESPONDED. UPON OPENING PACKAGE, FOUND LITHIUM ION BATTERIES, BUT NO WARNING LABEL ON BOX. FLAGGED PACKAGE AS POSSIBLE UNDECLARED HAZMAT AS PER UPS POLICY AND NOTIFIED SUPERVISOR.
